description: Blue Origin’s New Glenn successfully launched NASA’s ESCAPADE mission to Mars on November 13, 2025, marking its second flight and its first ocean booster landing on the ship Jacklyn. The mission deploys twin satellites built by Rocket Lab to study how the solar wind strips Mars’ atmosphere during a 22-month journey to the Red Planet.
title: Blue Origin Joins SpaceX in Orbital Booster Reuse Era With New Glenn’s Successful Launch and Landing

description: A large-scale AI analysis of more than two million Mars orbiter images shows that the planet’s dark slope streaks form through seasonal dust avalanches, not flowing briny water. The results settle a long-running debate, revealing that wind-driven dust activity shapes Mars’ surface and offering new insights into the planet’s climate past and exploration future.
title: AI-Assisted Study Finds No Evidence of Liquid Water in Mars’ Seasonal Dark Streaks

description: All Her Fault is a Sarah Snook starrer thriller drama that revolves around a mother who arrives at an address only to find out his son is missing.
title: All Her Fault Now Streaming on OTT: Know Where to Watch it Online

description: Based on the life of a Kabaddi player, Manathi Ganeshan, Bison, aims to show the struggles of the player as he belonged to the marginalized community, the struggles, challenges through the form of caste and creed, he still made it to play for the country while forming his own identity.
title: Bison OTT Release Date Reportedly Revealed Online: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Fallout Season 2 returns with an epic adventure through the Mojave wasteland. With a weekly release schedule, powerful performances, and an IMDb rating of 8.3/10, the new season explores New Vegas, Mr. House’s secrets, and the evolving bond between Lucy and The Ghoul.
title: Fallout Season 2 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Jolly LLB 3 is an Akshay Kumar and Arshad Warsi starrer courtroom film that is now streaming on Netflix. The film is a blend of comedy, emotions, and high-intensity drama.
title: Jolly LLB Out on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: The latest Jurassic World adventure, Jurassic World: Rebirth, streams on November 14, 2025, exclusively on Peacock Hub via JioHotstar. With a mix of returning favorites, new threats, and evolved dinosaurs, this action-packed film promises to delight franchise fans worldwide.
title: Jurassic World: Rebirth Now Streaming on JioHotstar: Everything You Need to Know

description: Kathleen Madigan: The Family Thread is an upcoming comedy show that revolves around Kathleen discussing topics like family dynamics, casual gambling, church rivalry, and more.
title: Kathleen Madigan: The Family Thread OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Emulators have become essential PC tools in 2025, enabling users to run Android apps, mobile games and classic PS2 titles with ease. Popular options like BlueStacks, MEmu Play, GameLoop, PCSX2 and MuMuPlayer offer strong performance, broad compatibility and features suited to different needs. BlueStacks and MEmu focus on Android gaming, GameLoop targets competitive mobile titles, PCSX2 enhances PS2 gameplay, and MuMuPlayer provides a lightweight option.
title: Best Emulators for PC in 2025: BlueStacks, GameLoop, PCSX2, and More Options You Can Try Out Today

description: Google DeepMind has unveiled SIMA 2, an upgraded Gemini powered AI agent that can reason about its actions, plan tasks and interact with users through text while playing 3D open world games. The system shows better generalisation to new titles, accepts multimodal prompts and improves through self generated training data. DeepMind sees SIMA 2 as a step toward natural language controlled real world robotics.
title: Google DeepMind Introduces SIMA 2, a Gemini-Powered AI Agent That Can Play Video Games

description: Google has begun rolling out native call recording to older Pixel models, following earlier confirmation that the feature would expand beyond newer devices. Users running the November Feature Drop and the latest Google Phone app are now reportedly seeing the option, with availability extending to all supported Pixels starting from the Pixel 6. The update lets users record calls automatically or manually, with mandatory warning tones for compliance.
title: Google Expands Native Call Recording to Older Pixel Phones With Latest Update

description: Music buffs are spoilt for choice today, with a plethora of music streaming apps available on the market. Apple Music, Spotify, and YouTube Music are among the most popular choices among listeners. While some of these platforms offer a basic tier that offers free, ad-supported music streaming, you have to pay to access others. So, if you’re planning to embark on your music streaming journey, we’ve compared Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music to determine what they offer.
title: Spotify vs Apple Music vs YouTube Music: Features, Price in India Compared

description: Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini, which are expected to be unveiled as the successor to Vivo S30 and Vivo S30 Pro Mini, are tipped to launch in China in December. The key technical specifications of the phones have been surfacing online for a while now, suggesting they might offer some upgrades over their predecessors. Now, the chipset of the purported Vivo S50 series has been leaked. The lineup is said to be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC, which is yet to be launched.
title: Vivo S50 Series Tipped to Launch Next Month With a Snapdragon Chip

description: Qualcomm has introduced its Dragonwing IQ X chipsets for industrial computing, designed to power PLCs, advanced HMIs, edge controllers and ruggedised PCs. Built on Oryon CPU architecture with 4nm process tech, the processors offer up to 12 cores and 45 TOPS of AI performance for tasks such as defect detection and predictive maintenance. The series supports harsh environments, extensive I/O and major industrial software ecosystems.
title: Qualcomm Unveils Dragonwing IQ-X Series Industrial Chipsets, Supports AI Workflows for Smart Industries

description: Australian authorities have warned of a new cryptocurrency scam in which criminals file fake reports through the government’s ReportCyber portal and then impersonate police officers to deceive victims. Using real case reference numbers, scammers pressure individuals into moving their crypto assets to fraudulent accounts. The AFP and Australia’s cyber security agency have urged the public to avoid unsolicited calls tied to unfamiliar cybercrime reports and to verify any communication through official channels.
title: Scammers Exploit Australia’s Cybercrime Portal to Impersonate Police and Steal Crypto, AFP Warns

description: In a statement, Ubisoft said it had also asked Euronext to halt trading of its shares and its bonds until its results are published and would “will inform the market of the date on which trading will restart.”
title: Ubisoft Delays Earnings Release on Due Date, Requests Trading of Its Shares Be Halted

description: The Vivo X300 series is confirmed to launch soon in India. The lineup, including the Vivo X300 Pro and Vivo X300, will be sold in the country via Amazon, Flipkart, and the company's online store. Recently, a report highlighted that the tech firm might launch the standard Vivo X300 in an India-exclusive Red colour variant. Now, the Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed the existence of the same. Moreover, the company has confirmed the key specifications of the upcoming handsets.
title: Vivo X300 Series Specs Confirmed, India-Exclusive Red Colour Teased

description: Anthropic has confirmed that Claude was used in a large-scale agentic cyberattack in September, marking the first known incident where an AI system carried out most of an operation with minimal human input. The company says a Chinese state-sponsored group jailbroke Claude by disguising malicious tasks as harmless subtasks. Claude then autonomously scanned networks, wrote exploits, stole data and documented breaches across about 30 global targets.
title: Claude Jailbroken by Chinese Hackers to Orchestrate First-of-Its-Kind AI Cyberattack

description: Oppo Reno 15, comprising the Reno 15 and Reno 15 Pro, will be launched in China by the tech firm on November 17. While the unveiling is only a few days away, the two handsets have been listed on the company's online store, revealing their storage variants and colour options. The Oppo Reno 15 Pro will be offered in four RAM and storage variants, while the vanilla Reno 15 will be sold in five RAM and storage configurations. Moreover, both phones will be offered in China via the company's website.
title: Oppo Reno 15 Series Storage Variants, Colourways Revealed Ahead of China Launch

description: Apple began rolling out the first beta version of the upcoming iOS 26.2 update in early November. Now, nearly a week after the beta 1 release, the company has started rolling out the second beta of iOS 26.2. The new firmware version brings a few design changes and a few visual adjustments for the Liquid Glass design. Moreover, the company has listed a few known issues that are found in the iOS 26.2 beta 2 update, including an issue where phones running the first beta of iOS 26.2 might show the handsets running the second beta on AirDrop.
title: Apple Begins Rolling Out iOS 26.2 Beta 2 With More Customisation Options, Bug Fixes

description: The Centre, on Friday, notified the Digital Personal Data Protection (DPDP) Act, 2025, bringing some of the rules into effect immediately. The notification comes nearly 10 months after the DPDP Rules, 2025, a draft of the bill was circulated in January. Among the rules that come into effect now is the Right to Information (RTI) Act, 2005, amendment.
title: Centre Notifies DPDP Rules 2025, RTI Amendment 2025 Comes Into Force

description: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Edge has been silently launched in select markets. It is the latest addition to the Galaxy Book 5 series and arrives as the successor to the Galaxy Book 4 Edge, introduced in September 2024. The AI PC is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon X chipset, accompanied by an Adreno GPU and a Hexagon NPU. It sports a 15.6-inch full HD IPS screen. The Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Edge comes with 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 512 GB of eUFS onboard storage.
title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Edge 5G With Snapdragon X Chip Silently Listed on Website: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp is reportedly working on its upcoming username-based search and calling feature, with the newest iOS beta indicating continued development. The update shows work on displaying usernames when users look up unfamiliar phone numbers, along with limited profile details, while keeping numbers hidden during username searches. The feature is planned for release next year. WhatsApp is expected to make identifying unknown contacts simpler and enhance privacy, clarity and user confidence when dealing with messages or calls from unfamiliar numbers.
title: WhatsApp Testing Username-Based Search and Calling in Latest iOS Beta: Report

description: Bitcoin dropped to $96,800 as renewed selling pressure hit the crypto market, driven by liquidity stress, whale outflows, and a global shift toward risk-off sentiment. Major altcoins also declined sharply, with Ethereum trading near $3,100. Analysts warn that thin participation and weakening macro conditions may keep volatility elevated, though upcoming policy moves and liquidity injections could influence short-term recovery.
title: Bitcoin Slips to $96,800 as Market Faces Renewed Pressure

description: Elon Musk has begun rolling out X Chat in beta, replacing Direct Messages with a new encrypted communications system. Aimed at unifying messaging on the platform, X Chat offers end-to-end encryption, file sharing and vanishing messages, with audio and video calling built in. Access requires a four-digit PIN, a move some early users say adds friction. The feature is currently available only to a small test group.
title: Elon Musk Replaces X DMs With New Encrypted Chat Feature Supporting Large File Transfers

description: Oppo Find X9 series, which was recently unveiled in China, will reportedly be launched in India at under Rs. 75,000. The lineup, including the Find X9 Pro and Find X9, debuted globally on October 28. However, its launch in India is scheduled for November 18. Powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip, the vanilla Find X9 is confirmed to be available in the country in two RAM and storage configurations. Meanwhile, the Pro model will be sold in the country with a single RAM and storage option. Moreover, both phones will be available in India via Flipkart.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro, X9 Price in India Just Leaked: Here’s How Much It May Cost

description: Rockstar Games will release Red Dead Remption on Android and iOS via Netflix Games next month. The acclaimed Western will also launch on PS5, Xbox Series S/X, and Nintendo Switch 2 on December 2. Read Dead Redemption will also be available with PS Plus Game Catalogue on the same date.
title: Red Dead Redemption Is Coming to Netflix on iOS and Android, PS5, Xbox Series S/X and Switch 2 Next Month

description: A new leak suggests Vivo is planning major battery upgrades for its next flagship lineup, likely the X500 series, with capacities around 7,000mAh. The tipster also claims some upcoming mid-range Vivo phones may feature even larger 8,000mAh to 9,000mAh cells. The X500 lineup is expected to launch late next year, while the X300 Ultra is still pending launch. However, global models may continue using smaller batteries, as seen with the international X300 series.
title: Vivo X500 Could Get 7,000mAh Batteries, Mid-Range Models May Pack Up to 9,000mAh, Tipster Claims

description: Poco F8 Pro and Poco F8 Ultra have been listed on the Geekbench website ahead of the launch. The handsets are listed with the Snapdragon 8 Elite and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipsets, respectively, running Android 16. The Pro model has 12GB of RAM, while the Ultra variant is listed with 16GB of RAM. Both handsets are expected to be launched in China and the global markets soon.
title: Poco F8 Pro, Poco F8 Ultra Listed on Geekbench Ahead of Launch in China and Global Markets

description: Google’s rumoured Gemini 3 AI models continue to generate buzz, with a new leak suggesting the company may launch Gemini 3 Pro alongside Nano Banana 2. A code snippet reportedly found in the Gemini iOS app hints that the next-gen image editor will run on Gemini 3 Pro. Users have also claimed early sightings in the Android app, though nothing is confirmed yet.
title: Google Could Release Gemini 3 Pro AI Model Alongside Nano Banana 2

description: Fresh leaks suggest the iPhone 16e and iPhone Air are seeing weak demand. Despite this, Apple is reportedly moving ahead with the iPhone 17e for spring 2026. The leak also claims iPhone Air production has halted after earlier output cuts, though it is unclear if the pause is permanent. The iPhone 16e, positioned as Apple’s low-cost option, is said to be underperforming, while the broader iPhone 17 lineup is reportedly experiencing strong demand.
title: iPhone 16e Demand Weak as iPhone Air Production Reportedly Halted

description: Directed by Santosh Kohle, Madam Sarpanch is the Hindi-dubbed version of the popular Marathi web series called Saubhagyawati Sarpanch. The series has finally landed on the digital screens. Currently streaming on the Ultra Play OTT platform.
title: Madam Sarpanch Now Streaming on OTT: Know Where to Watch This Hindi Dub Version of Saubhagyawati Sarpanch Online

description: OnePlus 15 was launched in India by the Chinese smartphone maker on November 13 as its new flagship handset. At the end of the event, the company teased that the OnePlus 15R will also launch soon. The company has yet to announce the exact launch date for the phone. Moreover, its specifications and features are also unknown. However, it is said to be unveiled as the rebranded model of the OnePlus Ace 6, which was recently unveiled in India. It could feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and a dual rear camera unit.
title: OnePlus 15R Officially Teased During OnePlus 15 Launch Event; Reported to Launch Next Month

description: Google has introduced new AI-powered shopping features across Search, AI Mode and the Gemini app in the US. The tools aim to speed up product discovery, comparison and checkout by offering natural language search, shoppable images, comparison tables and real-time inventory data. A new “Let Google Call” feature can contact local stores for stock and pricing, while agentic checkout can track prices and auto-purchase items with permission. The updates rely on Google’s Shopping Graph and are expected to expand to more regions over time.
title: Google Introduces Major AI Shopping Upgrades Across Search and the Gemini App Including 'Let Google Call'

description: Specifications of the Honor 500 Pro have been leaked by a tipster ahead of its launch in China.  The upcoming handset will sport a 6.55-inch 120Hz display. It is tipped to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, coupled with up to 16GB of RAM. For optics, the upcoming handset may carry a 200-megapixel main camera. The Honor 500 Pro could pack an 8,000mAh battery.
title: Honor 500 Pro Specifications Tipped Ahead of Launch; May Get Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC and 8,00mAh Battery

description: Spotify has introduced new Premium plans in India, bringing the total number of subscription tiers to four. The most expensive out of the four is the Spotify Premium Platinum plan, which offers AI DJ, AI Playlist Creation, Lossless Audio Quality, and playlist mix features. However, all paid plans in India provide ad-free music and audiobook streaming. Separately, the company has launched its new AI-generated summaries feature for audiobooks, dubbed Audiobooks Recaps. It is currently in the beta phase and is only available for select English audiobooks on iOS.
title: Spotify Launches New Premium Plans in India; Adds AI Audiobook Recap Feature

description: Sony has revealed the slate of games joining PS Plus Game Catalogue in November. This month's lineup includes GTA 5, just as a leak had claimed. Other games joining Game Catalogue in November include survival title Pacific Drive, psychological horror game Still Wakes the Deep, and puzzle adventure title The Talos Principle 2.
title: GTA 5, Pacific Drive, The Talos Principle 2 and More Join PS Plus Game Catalogue in November

description: Following the launch of the Blade V80 Design in select markets on Wednesday, ZTE is now rumoured to be developing another smartphone. A tipster has shared images of the purported ZTE Nubia S2R, showcasing its design. It is expected to arrive as a budget smartphone from the brand. The unannounced handset appears to have a single camera and an LED flash at the back, while its front panel has noticeably thicker bezels.
title: ZTE Nubia S2R Design Leaked Ahead of Launch; to Come With Single Rear Camera

description: OpenAI has introduced group chats in ChatGPT, allowing multiple users to collaborate within a shared conversation. The feature lets users create a group, invite others via a link, and interact together with the AI for projects or everyday tasks. Currently rolling out in select regions, OpenAI says wider availability will follow after it gathers early feedback from users.
title: ChatGPT Group Chats Feature Launched, OpenAI Brings Social Interactions to the AI App

description: Itel has launched a new variant of the Itel A90 Limited Edition in India. It now comes with 128GB of onboard storage. The handset made its debut in September as a limited-edition counterpart to the standard A90 and offered 64GB of onboard storage. While you get more storage now, the rest of the features and specifications remain identical to the existing model. The Unisoc T7100 chipset powers the handset and packs a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Itel A90 Limited Edition 128GB Storage Variant Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: UIDAI now lets Aadhaar holders view their authentication history for the past six months, giving users a simple way to track when and where their ID was used. The log lists successful and failed verification attempts and helps spot unusual activity early. Anyone with Aadhaar and a linked mobile number can access it through the UIDAI website, making it a useful tool for staying on top of digital identity security.
title: Is Someone Misusing Your Aadhaar? Here’s How to Find Out

description: The OnePlus 15 is the latest flagship Android smartphone in India. It has a 6.78-inch AMOLED display and runs on a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It carries a 7,300mAh battery. It has triple rear cameras and supports 120W wired charging.  Here’s a quick comparison between the OnePlus 15 and iPhone 17.
title: OnePlus 15 vs iPhone 17: Price in India, Specifications Compared
